title: M-01 Mutation Intent Definition
description: Defines the mandatory structural and semantic requirements for any proposed M-01 Mutation Intent before it enters GSEP Stage 1 (Intent Vetting).

intent_id.description: Unique cryptographic identifier for the M-01 payload proposal.

target_system.description: The specific component or subsystem targeted for mutation/evolution.

objective_narrative.description: Clear, high-level textual objective of the mutation.

m02_payload_reference.description:
Reference hash or location of the corresponding M-02 Payload (code/config).
	Must be cryptographically linked for Stage 2 verification (PSIM).

anticipated_S01_gain.description: Initial, unverified estimation of expected Efficacy (S-01) improvement.

resource_pre_request.description: Mandatory resource allocation request for Stage 3 PSR execution (used by RACM in S-02 calculation prep).
